question: Do you smoke?
criteria: Must clearly state yes or no
Can include type of smoking (cigarettes, cigars, pipes, etc.)

question: How much do you smoke?
criteria: Must specify quantity (cigarettes per day, packs per week, etc.)
Must be specific numerical amount if smoker

question: Since when do you smoke?
criteria: Must include time period (years, months, age when started)
Can include context about when smoking began
